alert.note: Alert for Mobile (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 11:25PM CDT until April 14 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MOBILE AND EASTERN GEORGE COUNTIES... At 1125 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Citronelle to 9 miles northwest of Vancleave, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Chunchula, Semmes, Tanner Williams and Wilmer. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for southeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
